thamata awashya aanduwa rakina deshapalanayak nowa rata rakina aanduwak bawath ratata aadaraya karana oonama kenakuta ema aanduwa samanga ekwa ratata wada kirimata awasthawa athi bawath janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha awadharanaya kaleya.janatha warama gena janatha prashnawalata wisandum nolabunu tharuna deshapalanagnyayan aanduwata ena wita owunta ida salasanne ada wadath ratata awashyawa aththe rata desa aadarayen balana, ratata wada karana minisun nisa bawath janadhipathithuma pawasiya.ada boho piris me paththata enne wathman aanduwa karana sama deyakadima janatha adahas niyojanaya wima nisa bawa pawasu janadhipathiwaraya kumanthranakarayanta thaman samanga wada karannata nohaki bawath prakasha kaleya.janadhipathiwaraya mese prakasha kale piliyandala madhya maha widyalaye pihinum thatakaya sisu ayithiyata path kirime saha kamkaru ha kamkaru sabandatha amathi gamini lokuge mahathage deshapalana jiwithayata wasara 30k pirima nimiththen ema widyalayiya kridanganayedi 26 da pawathi uthsawayata ekwemini.pihinum saha kimidum pahasukamwalin samanwitha me pihinum thatakaya sandaha waya kara athi mudala rupiyal miliyana 49ki.
